import React from "react" import frameImage from "../assets/frame.png" import SignUpForm from "./SignUPForm"; import LoginForm from "./LoginFrom"; const Template=({title,desc1,desc2,image,formType,setIsLoggedIn })=>{ return(

{title}

{desc1} {desc2}

{formType==="signup"?():() }

oR

); } export default Template;
